properties.name: Layout
properties.description: Select one of the three predefined layouts. Columns features separate columns. Grid groups the columns together in a single block. Table displays a table structure complete with a table head.

properties.name: Skin
properties.description: Skin defines the column elements to be colored in main color for each column. It's the fastest way to color the columns. Also there are color options available for each element to create a unique coloring.

properties.name: Main skin color
properties.description: Set main skin color to color elements according to the selected skin.

properties.name: Round off column corners
properties.description: Turn on this option to make column edges rounded.

properties.name: Columns border
properties.description: Turn on this option to display column border.

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Set the head column's title. The title will be displayed on the level with the titles of the rest of the columns.

properties.name: Features
Text
properties.description: Enter the feature name.

properties.name: Hint
properties.description: Add a hint to provide your customers with additional information or provide a more detailed description of the feature. Hover on the question mark next to the feature name to display the hint.
Set the names for the features to be displayed in the comparison table. Each feature name is displayed on the level with the corresponding feature in the table.

properties.name: Text Color
properties.description: Set the head column's text color.

properties.name: Background Color
properties.description: Set the head column's background color.

properties.name: Content
Featured column
properties.description: Use this option to highlight a column against the other ones. Hint: use it to highlight your most profitable plan.

properties.name: Title
properties.description: Set the columns title. As a rule, it's the name of your plan.

properties.name: Caption
properties.description: Set a short additional description as the title's caption. For example, you can say here who will profit the most from this plan.

properties.name: Features
Text
properties.description: Enter the feature description.

properties.name: Icon
properties.description: Select feature icon from the list

properties.name: Hint
properties.description: Add a hint to provide your customers with additional information or provide a more detailed description of the feature. Hover on the question mark next to the feature text to display the hint.
The list of features. You can list any feature or item, characteristic of the offer.

properties.name: Price prefix
properties.description: Set small price prefix.

properties.name: Currency
properties.description: Choose the currency.

properties.name: Price
properties.description: Set the price.

properties.name: Price postfix
properties.description: Set small price postfix.

properties.name: Caption
properties.description: Set the price caption - payment period, special offer, discount price, etc.

properties.name: Button label
properties.description: Set the button label text.

properties.name: Button link
properties.description: Set the link to redirect your user to after clicking on the button.

properties.name: Open link in new window
properties.description: Set the button link target (new or current window)

properties.name: Caption
properties.description: Set the button caption. This text under the button can be used as an extra call to action.

properties.name: Picture Url (3:2)
properties.description: Paste the URL of the picture you want to display on your column. The picture's aspect ratio should be 3:2.

properties.name: Ribbon text
properties.description: Set the ribbon text. The ribbon is a visual element that will attract more attention to the column where it's placed.

properties.name: Background color
properties.description: Set the ribbon background color.

properties.name: Text color
properties.description: Set the ribbon text color.

properties.name: Main skin color
properties.description: Set main skin color to color this column's elements according to the selected skin.

features.text: Clean and easy to use app

features.hint: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

features.text: Clean and easy to use app

features.text: Clean and easy to use app

features.hint: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

properties.description: Add the content to be displayed in each element of a column.

properties.name: Elements
Show title
properties.description: Turn on/off the title.

properties.name: Title color
properties.description: Set the title's text color.

properties.name: Caption color
properties.description: Set the caption's text color.

properties.name: Font size (px)
properties.description: Set the title font size in pixels.

properties.name: Font weight
properties.description: Select the title font weight.

properties.name: Features
properties.description: Turn on/off the features.

properties.name: Style
properties.description: Select the features list style from the list. Clean displays the features only without any additional elements. Divided separates the features with lines. Striped displays the features list in a zebra pattern.

properties.name: Align
properties.description: Select the features text align.

properties.name: Icon color
properties.description: Set the features icon color.

properties.name: Text color
properties.description: Set the features text color.

properties.name: Price
properties.description: Turn on/off the price.

properties.name: Price color
properties.description: Set the price text color.

properties.name: Caption color
properties.description: Set the price caption color.

properties.name: Price font size (px)
properties.description: Set the price font size in pixels.

properties.name: Font weight
properties.description: Choose the price font weight.

properties.name: Button
properties.description: Turn on/off the button.

properties.name: Button type
properties.description: Choose the button type.

properties.name: Button size
properties.description: Choose the button size.

properties.name: Button color
properties.description: Set the button color.

properties.name: Button label color
properties.description: Set the button label color.

properties.name: Caption color
properties.description: Set the button caption color.

properties.name: Show picture
properties.description: Turn on/off the picture.
Arrange the elements to be displayed for each columns, and their order.
